content.html: The balance between automating a repetitive manual task and doing the manual task periodically is incredibly tricky. It's incredibly tempting to automate things to make our lives easier. But is it actually saving you time? Or would it take over a year to be net neutral?
content.value:
The balance between automating a repetitive manual task and doing the manual task periodically is incredibly tricky.

It's incredibly tempting to automate things to make our lives easier. But is it actually saving you time? Or would it take over a year to be net neutral?
